title: Prediction: Brazil vs Colombia – Betting Tips, Team News, Key Facts

title: Atletico Madrid 2-4 Barcelona: Talking points as Catalans nail statement victory to take charge of La Liga title race
description: On Sunday evening at the Wanda Metropolitano, Atletico Madrid took the lead against Barcelona through Julian Alvarez in the last minute of the first half, and when substitute Alexander Sorloth doubled it in the 70th, the Rojiblancos appeared to be cruising towards a hugely important triumph over the Catalan giants.
